00195 class Matrix3 : public Matrix {
00196 public:
00197   Matrix3() : Matrix() {}
00198   Matrix3(const Matrix& _m) : Matrix(_m) {}
00199   Matrix3(double a00,double a01,double a02,
00200           double a10,double a11,double a12,
00201           double a20,double a21,double a22);
00202   double get(long i1,long i2) const {return getElement()[3*i1+i2];}
00203   double get(long i) const {return getElement()[i];}
00204   void set(long i1,long i2, double a) {foundEigenVals=false;getElement()[3*i1+i2]=a;}
00205   double trace(){return getElement()[0]+getElement()[4]+getElement()[8];}
00206   void dump() const;  
00208   Matrix3 operator+(const Matrix3& m) const;

00216   complex<double> getEigenValX() const {if(!foundEigenVals){calcEigenvalues();} return eigx;}
